thread.title: Quaint, Great Location, Excellent Service - Review
thread.title_full: Quaint, Great Location, Excellent Service - Review of Warwick New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: PSL1111
title: Quaint, Great Location, Excellent Service - Review
text: We stayed at the Warwick for a 4 day weekend. What a lovely spot! The location is perfect, just a block from 5th Avenue shopping, and a short walk to Broadway and Times Square. The room was nicely appointed, the bar was cute with lots of atmosphere, and above all, their employees were super friendly and efficient. We had a great time and would go back in a second.
